attributes.action: Stop speeding in Stansfield Road E16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stansfield Road E16 is a cut through road for motorists who want to get from the A13 at Beckton to Canning Town.  At the moment motorists are speeding down this road their have already been numerous accidents.  There is a farm and a park in this road and children walking to nearby schools.  Please put some kind of speeding device in Stansfield Road to stop the speeding before someone is killed or seriously injured.
